Rulings.Base: 1. This effect activates even when your opponent Normal Summons or Special Summons a monster to his side of the field.\n2. If multiple monsters are Special Summoned at once, as long as at least 1 of them is a Level 4 or lower Thunder-Type monster the effect of "Wattcannon" will activate.\n3. The effect to inflict damage is mandatory and starts a Chain.
